messages.subject: Forrest Gump
messages.msgSnippet: ... Ah, so there is a book. Maybe I ll read it sometime -- although I m not sure how much better it could be than the movie! :) I agree that Tom Hanks is a
messages.messageBody:
>Eryn,
> Forrest Gump is a book also. I started reading it a couple years ago
>after I saw the movie, but I gave up on it. The movie was wonderful, IMO. I
>think Tom Hanks is a brilliant actor!
>Mary Ellen.

Ah, so there is a book. Maybe I'll read it sometime -- although I"m not sure
how much better it could be than the movie! :) I agree that Tom Hanks is a
brilliant actor -- he's got to be one of my favorites! :_) ~Eryn

==
"I dreamed I was a butterfly, flitting around in the sky;
then I awoke. Now I wonder: Am I a man who dreamt of
being a butterfuly, or am I a butterfly dreaming that I am
a man?" - Chuang Tsu
